title: torch.svd() get error, w/ CUDA 9.0 w/o MAGMA
body_html:
I got the following error using torch.svd(). It may because missing magma package with CUDA 9.0. Is there any work around? many thanks!

U,D,V = torch.svd(x)
RuntimeError: No CUDA implementation of 'gesvd'. Install MAGMA and rebuild cutorch (http://icl.cs.utk.edu/magma/) at /home/hangzhang/pytorch/aten/src/THC/generic/THCTensorMathMagma.cu:280
